sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the effect of Comfeel transparent dressing on chemotherapeutic phlebitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨康惠尔透明贴对化疗性静脉炎的防治作用.

sentence.Network_en: The CBNC canexpress P - gp protein and display tolerability to chemotherapeutic drugs such as vincristineand daunorubicin ( DNR ) etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 该脐血有核细胞能表达P -gp,对化疗药物长春新碱、柔红霉素具有一定的耐受性.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To observe the efficacy of MEBO in treating skin lesion caused by cytotoxinic chemotherapeutic agents.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 观察湿润烧伤膏对细胞毒性抗癌化疗药物所致皮肤损伤的治疗作用.

化疗指数(chemotherapeutic index)是衡量化疗药物安全性的评价参数,一般可用感染动物的LD50/ED50 或LD5/ED95 表示。通常该值越大表示使用时安全范围越大。但.
* 可做为化疗药剂(chemotherapeutic agents)* 胺基糖苷抗生素(Aminoglycosides) --链霉素 (streptomycin), 卡那霉素 (kanamycin).
